text: Brickellia odontophylla is a Mexican species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is native to northern Mexico, in the states of Chihuahua, Coahuila, Nuevo León, Durango, and Zacatecas.Turner, B. L. 1997. The Comps of Mexico: A systematic account of the family Asteraceae, vol. 1 – Eupatorieae. Phytologia Memoirs 11: i–iv, 1–272Gray, Asa. 1882. Proceedings of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences 17: 206 in Latin ==References== odontophylla Category:Flora of Mexico Category:Plants described in 1882
title: Brickellia odontophylla
